favourites.name: Nut-Free Macarons
favourites.description: These macarons are a sweet and delicate treat that are perfect for anyone with a nut allergy. Made with a crispy shell and a creamy filling, they're a perfect afternoon snack or dessert.

favourites.name: Fluffy Pancakes
favourites.description: Get ready to flip out over these fluffy, perfect pancakes! Light and airy, these pancakes are the ultimate breakfast treat. Top with your favorite fruits, syrup, or whipped cream, and enjoy a stack of pure bliss!

favourites.name: How to Make the Best Sugar Cookies
favourites.description: These classic cookies are a timeless favorite that never go out of style. Soft, buttery, and perfectly sweet, they're the epitome of comfort food and will remind you of childhood memories with every bite. Whether you're baking them for a holiday gathering or just for a sweet treat to enjoy with a glass of milk, these sugar cookies are sure to be a hit with everyone who takes a bite!

favourites.name: Savory Lasagna
favourites.description: Dive into layers of savory goodness with this classic comfort food! Tender pasta sheets are layered with a hearty meat sauce, rich cheese, and aromatic herbs and spices, all baked to perfection until bubbly and golden. It's a dish that's perfect for sharing with family and friends, and guaranteed to satisfy your cravings!

favourites.name: Cinnamon Roll Cheesecake
favourites.description: Get ready for a dessert extravaganza with this cinnamon roll cheesecake! Creamy cheesecake filling is baked atop a cinnamon roll crust with a swirl of cinnamon sugar and a final icing glaze for an extra-sweet touch. With all the flavors of a classic cinnamon roll in a decadent cheesecake form, it's a showstopper that'll have everyone asking for seconds!

favourites.name: Milkshake: The Caramel Alon
favourites.description: This milkshake is the ultimate indulgence, with rich candy pieces swirled throughout and a generous drizzle of caramel sauce on top. It's perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth and cooling off on a hot day.

favourites.name: Jacket Potato: The Old Fashioned
favourites.description: Bring back some nostalgia with this old fashioned jacket potato recipe, featuring buttery and tender potatoes that are smothered in cheese and cooked to perfection.

favourites.name: Milkshake: The Tiffany
favourites.description: Indulge in a sweet treat with this milkshake, featuring vanilla ice cream and chunks of chocolate candy blended together. Topped with sprinkles and caramel sauce, this milkshake is a classic favorite.

favourites.name: The Best Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
favourites.description: There are a few crucial steps to baking the chewiest, tastiest chocolate chip cookies. First, skip using chips and opt for chunks. Second, instead of using just one type of chocolate (like semisweet), use a mix of semisweet, milk, and dark chocolate. Third, take the time to allow the cookie dough to rest overnight in the refrigerator. Yes, we know it's a pain, but doing so will yield a cookie with a more complex flavor and delicious toffee notes. Lastly, use an ice cream scoop to portion the cookie dough onto the baking sheet. This will produce even-sized cookies every single time. Follow these simple steps, and you'll be rewarded with a cookie that's crisp and chewy on the outside and gooey on the inside!

favourites.name: 2-ingredient Pasta
favourites.description: This 2-ingredient pasta is a quick and easy dinner option, with pasta and your favorite jarred sauce.

favourites.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
favourites.description: Indulge in the ultimate breakfast with a stack of buttermilk pancakes to kickstart your day. The star ingredient, buttermilk, joins forces with eggs and melted butter to provide moisture and flavor while baking powder and baking soda add fluffiness. The batter cooks up beautifully golden brown, light, and airy. These versatile pancakes can be made with your favorite mix-ins, like juicy blueberries, decadent chocolate chips, or sweet bananas. And the best part? Prepare a double batch and freeze for future breakfast bliss, eliminating the need for morning stove-side acrobatics. With every bite, these pancakes promise a warm hug to start your day right.

favourites.name: Blueberry Banana Pancakes
favourites.description: Start your day off right with these amazing pancakes! Packed with fresh blueberries and sweet bananas, these pancakes are a breakfast dream come true.

favourites.name: Tomato And Anchovy Pasta
favourites.description: Savor the bold flavors of this Tomato and Anchovy Pasta, a perfect weeknight meal that's both simple and satisfying. With a zesty tomato sauce and umami-packed anchovies, this dish will have your taste buds dancing in no time!
